page.title: 01Location
page.content: The area is located west of the Bedford urban area in the northern part of a prominent ridge which stretches north-south along the county boundary.Two major east - west routes cross the area:A 428 to Northampton and the A 422 to Milton Keynes,Oxford and the west country in the south.Both routes command fine views of the surrounding countryside which is open,arable farmland on rising ground drained by 2 brooks which are tributaries of the R.Ouse,joining the river at Bromham. Parts of three parishes are here:Turvey -farm populations;Bromham - Bromham Hospital with 330 occupants and about half of Stagsden(total population 1981 347).
